name: Auto Import Coupons from vcommission
author: Sanoj Sharma

sections.description:
REQUIREMENTS

  • You must have a valid vCommission Publisher’s account key. if not Sign Up Here for Affiliate account.
  • WordPress Coupon Plugin – WP Coupons and Deals must be installed before using the plugin.Download

KEY FEATURES

  •   Very lightweight, loads fast.
  •   Auto import coupons from vCommission portal to the WordPress site.
  •   Auto import coupons, categories & Stores.
  •   Runs twice a day.

I am looking for a feature, that’s not in the plugin. What can I do?

You can email me. We will try our best to work on your ideas.
sections.installation:
1. Install from wordpress.org.
  2. Activate the plugin.
  3. Go to Settings->WP VC Setting
  4. Add vCommission API key.
  5. That’s it. Sit back and relax.

short_description: WordPress Coupon plugin to auto-import affiliate coupon and deals to your WordPress site from vCommission partners account.
